subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Second-half goals from Juan Pablo Ángel and Dave van den Bergh rallied the Red Bulls past Real Salt Lake, 2-1, as they improved to 8-1-3 at the Meadowlands.
snippet: Second-half goals from Juan Pablo Ángel and Dave van den Bergh rallied the Red Bulls past Real Salt Lake, 2-1, as they improved to 8-1-3 at the Meadowlands.
